text: qal hud lqwmh: qad hll bikum eadhab waghadib min rabikum jl wela 'atujadilunani fi hadhih al'asnam alty samaytumuha alihatan 'antum wabawkm? ma nzzal allah biha min hujat wala brhan; li'anaha mkhlwqt la tadura wala tnfe, wa'iinama almebwd wahdah hu alkhaliq sbhanh, fantaziruu nuzul aleadhab ealaykum fa'iiniy mntzr maeakum nzwlh, whdha ghayat fi altahdid walweyd
